sharp.name: sharp
sharp.description: read a stich; read a person

improvements.secondCharacter: create a second character to play
improvements.newCharacterType: change your character to a new type
improvements.advanceBasicMoves: choose 3 basic moves and advance them
improvements.otherPlaybookMove: get a move from another playbook
improvements.gangOption: choose a new option for your gang
improvements.garageCrew: get a garage (workspace, detail) and crew
improvements.gangPackAlpha: get a gang (detail) and pack alpha
improvements.holdingOption: choose a new option for your holding
improvements.eraseHoldingOption: erase an option from your holding
improvements.followersOption: choose a new option for your followers
improvements.gigCrew: add a gig and you may change your crew
improvements.removeObligationGig: abandon or resolve an obligation gig for good
improvements.lifeSupport: add life support to your workspace, and now you can work on people there too

angel.special: if you and another character have sex, your Hx with them on your sheet goes immediately to +3, and they immediately get +1 to their Hx with you on their sheet. If that brings their Hx with you to +4, they reset it to +1 instead, as usual, and so mark experience.

sixthSense.title: sixth sense
sixthSense.description: when you open your brain to the world's psychic maelstrom, roll+sharp instead of roll+weird.

infirmary.title: infirmary
infirmary.description: you get an infirmary, a workspace with life support, a drug lab and a crew of 2 (Shigusa & Mox, maybe). Get patients into it and you can work on them like a savvyhead on tech (cf).

professionalCompassion.title: professional compassion
professionalCompassion.description: you can choose to roll+sharp instead of roll+Hx when you help someone who's rolling.

battlefieldGrace.title: battlefield grace
battlefieldGrace.description: while you are caring for people, not fighting, you get +1armor.

healingTouch.title: healing touch
healingTouch.description: when you put your hands skin-to-skin on a wounded person and open your brain to them, roll+weird. On a 10+, heal 1 segment. On a 7-9, heal 1 segment, but you're acting under fire from your patient's brain. On a miss: first, you don't heal them. Second, you've opened both your brain and theirs to the world's psychic maelstrom, without protection or preparation. For you, and for your patient if your patient's a fellow player's character, treat it as though you've made that move and missed the roll. For patients belonging to the MC, their experience and fate are up to the MC.

touchedByDeath.title: touched by death
touchedByDeath.description: whenever someone in your care dies, you get +1weird (max +3).

battleBabe.special: if you and another character have sex, nullify the other character's sex move. Whatever it is, it just doesn't happen.

dangerousSexy.title: dangerous & sexy
dangerousSexy.description: when you enter into a charged situation, roll+hot. On a 10+, hold 2. On a 7-9, hold 1. Spend your hold 1 for 1 to make eye contact with an NPC present, who freezes or flinches and can't take action until you break it off. On a miss, your enemies identify you immediately as their foremost threat.

iceCold.title: ice cold
iceCold.description: when you go aggro on an NPC, roll+cool instead of roll+hard. When you go aggro on another player's character, roll+Hx instead of roll+hard.

visionsOfDeath.title: visions of death
visionsOfDeath.description: when you go into battle, roll+weird. On a 10+, name one person who'll die and one who'll live. On a 7-9, name one person who'll die OR one person who'll live. Don't name a player's character; name NPCs only. e MC will make your vision come true, if it's even remotely possible. On a miss, you foresee your own death, and accordingly take -1 throughout the battle.

perfectInstincts.title: perfect instincts
perfectInstincts.description: when you've read a charged situation and you're acting on the MC's answers, take +2 instead of +1.

impossibleReflexes.title: impossible reflexes
impossibleReflexes.description: the way you move unencumbered counts as armor. If you're naked or nearly naked, 2-armor; if you're wearing non-armor fashion, 1-armor. If you're wearing armor, use it instead.

brainer.special: If you and another character have sex, you automatically do a deep brain scan on them, whether you have the move or not. Roll+weird as normal. However, the MC chooses which questions the other character's player answers.

implantSyringe.title: implant syringe (tag hi-tech)
implantSyringe.description: after you've tagged someone, if a brainer move allows you to inflict harm on them, inflict +1harm.

brainRelay.title: brain relay (area close hi-tech)
brainRelay.description: for purposes of brainer moves, if someone can see your brain relay, they can see you.

receptivityDrugs.title: receptivity drugs (tag hi-tech)
receptivityDrugs.description: tagging someone gives you +1hold if you then use a brainer move on them.

violationGlove.title: violation glove (hand hi-tech)
violationGlove.description: for purposes of brainer moves, mere skin contact counts as time and intimacy.

painWaveProjector.title: pain-wave projector (1-harm ap area loud reload hi-tech)
painWaveProjector.description: goes off like a reusable grenade. Hits everyone but you.

deepEarPlugs.title: deep ear plugs (worn hi-tech)
deepEarPlugs.description: protects the wearer from all brainer moves and gear.

unnaturalLustTransfixion.title: unnatural lust transfixion
unnaturalLustTransfixion.description: when you try to seduce someone, roll+weird instead of roll+hot.

casualBrainReceptivity.title: casual brain receptivity
casualBrainReceptivity.description: when you read someone, roll+weird instead of roll+sharp. Your victim has to be able to see you, but you don't have to interact.

deepBrainScan.title: deep brain scan
deepBrainScan.description:
when you have time and physical intimacy with someone — mutual intimacy like holding them in your arms, or 1-sided intimacy like they're restrained to a table — you can read them more deeply than normal. Roll+weird. On a 10+, hold 3. On a 7-9, hold 1. While you're reading them, spend your hold to ask their player questions, 1 for 1:
• what was your character's lowest moment?
• for what does your character crave forgiveness, and of whom?
• what are your character's secret pains?
• in what ways are your character's mind and soul vulnerable?
On a miss, you inflict 1-harm (ap) upon your subject, to no benefit.

directBrainWhisperProjection.title: direct-brain whisper projection
directBrainWhisperProjection.description: you can roll+weird to get the effects of going aggro, without going aggro. Your victim has to be able to see you, but you don't have to interact. If your victim forces your hand, your mind counts as a weapon (1-harm ap close loud-optional).

inBrainPuppetStrings.title: in-brain puppet strings
inBrainPuppetStrings.description:
when you have time and physical intimacy with someone — again, mutual or 1-sided — you can plant a command inside their mind. Roll+weird. On a 10+, hold 3. On a 7-9, hold 1. At your will, no matter the circumstances, you can spend your hold 1 for 1:
• inflict 1-harm (ap)
• they take -1 right now
If they fulfill your command, that counts for all your remaining hold. On a miss, you inflict 1-harm (ap) upon your subject, to no benefit.

chopper.special: If you and another character have sex, they immediately change their sheet to say Hx+3 with you. ey also choose whether to give you -1 or +1 to your Hx with them, on your sheet.

gang.title: gang
gang.vsGangs: +1harm vs smaller gangs, -1harm vs larger, per 1-size difference.

advantages.medium: your gang consists of 30 or so violent bastards. Medium instead of small.
advantages.nomadic: your gang's nomadic at heart, and able to maintain and repair its own bikes without a home base. It gets +mobile.
advantages.rich: your gang's self-sufficient, able to provide for itself by raiding and scavenging. It gets +rich.

problems.breakdown: your gang's bikes are in bad shape and need constant attention. Vulnerable: breakdown.
problems.grounded: your gang's bikes are picky and high-maintenance. Vulnerable: grounded.
problems.desertion: your gang's loose-knit, with members coming and going as they choose. Vulnerable: desertion.
problems.obligation: your gang is in significant debt to someone powerful. Vulnerable: obligation.
problems.disease: your gang is filthy and unwell. Vulnerable: disease.

packAlpha.title: pack alpha
packAlpha.description:
when you try to impose your will on your gang, roll+hard. On a 10+, all 3. On a 7-9, choose 1:
• they do what you want
• they don't fight back over it
• you don't have to make an example of one of them
On a miss, someone in your gang makes a dedicated bid to replace you for alpha.

fuckingThieves.title: fucking thieves
fuckingThieves.description: when you have your gang search their pockets and saddlebags for something, roll+hard. It has to be something small enough to fit. On a 10+, one of you happens to have just the thing, or close enough. On a 7-9, one of you happens to have something pretty close, unless what you're looking for is hi-tech, in which case no dice. On a miss, one of you used to have just the thing, but it turns out that some asswipe stole it from you.

driver.special: If you and another character have sex, roll+cool. On a 10+, it's cool, no big deal. On a 7-9, give them +1 to their Hx with you on their sheet, but give yourself -1 to your Hx with them on yours. On a miss, you gotta go: take -1 ongoing, until you prove that it's not like they own you or nothing.

noShitDriver.title: A no shit driver
noShitDriver.description:
when behind the wheel...
...if you do something under fire, add your car's power to your roll.
...if you try to seize something by force, add your car's power to your roll.
...if you go aggro, add your car's power to your roll.
...if you try to seduce or manipulate someone, add your car's looks to yourroll.
...if you help or interfere with someone, add your car's power to your roll.
...if someone interferes with you, add your car's weakness to their roll.

goodInTheClinch.title: Good in the clinch
goodInTheClinch.description: when you do something under fire, roll+sharp instead of roll+cool.

weatherEye.title: Weather eye
weatherEye.description: when you open your brain to the world's psychic maelstrom, roll+sharp instead of roll+weird.

daredevil.title: Daredevil
daredevil.description: if you go straight into danger without hedging your bets, you get +1armor. If you happen to be leading a gang or convoy, it gets +1armor too.

otherCarIsTank.title: My other car is a tank
otherCarIsTank.description: you get an additional car. Give it mounted machine guns (3-harm close/far area messy) or grenade launchers (4-harm close area messy) and +1armor.

gunLugger.special: if you and another character have sex, you take +1 forward. At your option, they take +1 forward too.

seriousGuns.title: serious guns
seriousGuns.grenadeTube: grenade tube (4-harm close area reload messy)
seriousGuns.apAmmo: ap ammo (ap) Add ap to all your guns.
seriousGuns.silencer: silencer (hi-tech) Remove loud from any of your guns.

battleHardened.title: battle-hardened
battleHardened.description: when you act under fire, roll+hard instead of roll+cool.

fuckThisShit.title: fuck this shit
fuckThisShit.description: name your escape route and roll+hard. On a 10+, sweet, you're gone. On a 7-9, you can go or stay, but if you go it costs you: leave something behind, or take something with you, the MC will tell you what. On a miss, you're caught vulnerable, half in and half out.

battlefieldInstincts.title: battlefield instincts
battlefieldInstincts.description: when you open your brain to the world's psychic maelstrom, roll+hard instead of roll+weird, but only in battle.

preparedForInevitable.title: prepared for the inevitable
preparedForInevitable.description: you have a well-stocked and high-quality first aid kit. It counts as an angel kit (cf ) with a capacity of 2-stock.

notToBeFuckedWith.title: not to be fucked with
notToBeFuckedWith.description: in battle, you count as a gang (3-harm gang small), with armor according to the circumstances.

hardHolder.special: if you and another character have sex, you can give the other character gifts worth 1-barter, at no cost to you.

gang.title: gang
gang.vsGangs: +1harm vs smaller gangs, -1harm vs larger, per 1-size difference.

advantages.largePopulation: your population is large, 200-300 souls. Surplus: +1barter, want: +disease.
advantages.smallPopulation: your population is small, 50-60 souls. Want: anxiety instead of want: hungry.
advantages.lucrativeRaiding: for gigs, add lucrative raiding. Surplus: +1barter, want: +reprisals.
advantages.protectionTribute: for gigs, add protection tribute. Surplus: +1barter, want: +obligation.
advantages.manufactory: for gigs, add a manufactory. Surplus: +1barter, want: +idle.
advantages.market: for gigs, add a bustling, widely-known market commons. Surplus: +1barter, want: +idle.
advantages.largeGang: your gang is large instead of medium, 60 violent people or so.
advantages.wellDisciplinedGang: your gang is well-disciplined. Drop unruly.
advantages.goodArmory: your armory is sophisticated and extensive. Your gang gets +1harm.
advantages.goodCompound: your compound is tall, deep and mighty, of stone and iron. Your gang gets +2armor when fighting in its defense.

problems.disease: your population is filthy and unwell. Want: +disease.
problems.famine: your population is lazy and drug-stupored. Want: +famine.
problems.decadence: your population is decadent and perverse. Surplus: -1barter, want: savagery.
problems.holdingOwesTribute: your holding owes protection tribute. Surplus: -1barter, want: +reprisals.
problems.smallGang: your gang is small instead of medium, only 10-20 violent people.
problems.gangSavagery: your gang is a pack of fucking hyenas. Want: savagery.
problems.shitArmory: your armory is for shit. Your gang gets -1harm.
problems.shitCoumpound: your compound is mostly tents, lean-tos and wooden walls. Your gang gets no armor bonus when fighting to defend it.

leadership.title: leadership
leadership.description:
when your gang fights for you, roll+hard. On a 10+, hold 3. On a 7-9, hold 1. Over the course of the fight, spend your hold 1 for 1 to make your gang:
• make a hard advance
• stand strong against a hard advance
• make an organized retreat
• show mercy to their defeated enemies
• fight and die to the last
On a miss, your gang turns on you or tries to hand you over to your enemy.

wealth.title: wealth
wealth.description: If your hold is secure and your rule unchallenged, at the beginning of the session, roll+hard. On a 10+, you have surplus at hand and available for the needs of the session. On a 7-9, you have surplus, but choose 1 want. On a miss, or if your hold is compromised or your rule contested, your hold is in want. e precise values of your surplus and want depend on your holding, as follows.

hocus.special: if you and another character have sex, you each hold 1. Either of you can spend your hold any time to help or interfere with the other, at a distance or despite any barriers that would normally prevent it.

advantages.dedicated: your followers are dedicated to you. Surplus: +1barter, and replace want: desertion with want: hunger.
advantages.fortune: your followers are involved in successful commerce. +1fortune.
advantages.augury: your followers, taken as a body, constitute a powerful psychic antenna. Surplus: +augury.
advantages.party: your followers are joyous and celebretory. Surplus: +party.
advantages.insight: your followers are rigorous and argumentative. Surplus: +insight.
advantages.hardWorking: your followers are hard-working, no-nonsense. Surplus: +1barter.
advantages.growth: your followers are eager, enthusiastic, and successful recruiters. Surplus: +growth

problems.fewFollowers: you have few followers, 10 or fewer. Surplus: -1barter.
problems.desertion: your followers aren't really yours, more like you're theirs. Want: judgment instead of want: desertion.
problems.desperation: your followers rely entirely on you for their lives and needs. Want: +desperation.
problems.disease: your followers disdain fashion, luxury and convention. Want: +disease.
problems.violence: your followers disdain law, peace, reason and society. Surplus: +violence.
problems.savagery: your followers are decadent and perverse. Want: +savagery.

fortunes.title: fortunes
fortunes.description: fortune, surplus and want all depend on your followers. At the beginning of the session, roll+fortune. On a 10+, your followers have surplus. On a 7-9, they have surplus, but choose 1 want. On a miss, they are in want. If their surplus lists barter, like 1-barter or 2-barter, that's your personal share.

frenzy.title: frenzy
frenzy.description:
When you speak the truth to a mob, roll+weird. On a 10+, hold 3. On a 7-9, hold 1. Spend your hold 1 for 1 to make the mob:
• bring people forward and deliver them.
• bring forward all their precious things.
• unite and fight for you as a gang (2-harm 0-armor size appropriate).
• fall into an orgy of uninhibited emotion: fucking, lamenting, fighting, sharing, celebrating, as you choose.
• go quietly back to their lives.
On a miss, the mob turns on you.

charismatic.title: charismatic
charismatic.description: when you try to manipulate someone, roll+weird instead of roll+hot.

seeingSouls.title: seeing souls
seeingSouls.description: when you help or interfere with someone, roll+weird instead of roll+Hx.

divineProtection.title: divine protection
divineProtection.description: your gods give you 1-armor. If you wear armor, use that instead, they don't add.

operator.special:
if you and another character have sex, get a new obligation gig: keeping [their name] happy (you keep them happy / you fucking blow it).

If you and the same character have sex again, don't get duplicate gigs. Just the first time.

crewContacts.title: crew / contacts
crewContacts.help: your crew or contacts can consist entirely of the other players' characters, or entirely of the MC's characters, or any mix. If they include any of the MC's characters, sketch them out — names (eg Gabble, Jaim, Pe, Wasted) and 1-line descriptions — with the MC. Make sure they're competent and suited to the gigs you've chosen.

obligationGigs.title: obligation gigs
obligationGigs.avoidingSomeone: avoiding someone (you keep well clear / they catch you in a bad spot)
obligationGigs.payingDebts: paying debts (you keep up with them / they come due)
obligationGigs.revenge: revenge (you victimize someone / they humilate you)
obligationGigs.protectingSomeone: protecting someone (nothing bad happens to them / they're gone)
obligationGigs.pursuingLuxury: pursuing luxury (beauty in your life / you wind up in a bad spot)
obligationGigs.maintainingHonor: maintaining your honor (you keep your word and your name / you cross a line)
obligationGigs.seekingAnswers: seeking answers (you get a clue / you chase a red herring)

moonlighting.title: moonlighting
moonlighting.description: you get 2-juggling. Whenever there's a stretch of downtime in play, or between sessions, choose a number of your gigs to work. Choose no more than your juggling. Roll+cool. On a 10+, you get profit from all the gigs you chose. On a 7-9, you get profit from at least 1; if you chose more, you get catastrophe from 1 and profit from the rest. On a miss, catastrophe all around. e gigs you aren't working give you neither profit nor catastrophe. Whenever you get a new gig, you also get +1juggling.

easyToTrust.title: easy to trust
easyToTrust.description: when you try to seduce or manipulate another player's character, roll+Hx instead of roll+hot. An NPC, roll+cool instead of roll+hot.

eyeOnTheDoor.title: eye on the door
eyeOnTheDoor.description: name your escape route and roll+cool. On a 10+ you're gone. On a 7-9, you can go or stay, but if you go it costs you: leave something behind, or take something with you, the MC will tell you what. On a miss, you're caught vulnerable, half in and half out.

opportunistic.title: opportunistic
opportunistic.description: when you interfere with someone who's rolling, roll+cool instead of roll+Hx. Asshole.

reputation.title: reputation
reputation.description: when you meet someone important (your call), roll+cool. On a hit, they've heard of you, and you say what they've heard; the MC will have them respond accordingly. On a 10+, you take +1forward for dealing with them as well. On a miss, they've heard of you, but the MC will decide what they've heard.

savvyHead.special:
If you and another character have sex, they automatically speak to you, as though they were a thing and you'd rolled a 10+, whether you have the move or not. The other player and the MC will answer your questions between them.

Otherwise, that move never works on people, only things.

thingsSpeak.title: things speak
thingsSpeak.description:
whenever you handle or examine something interesting, roll+weird. On a hit, you can ask the MC questions. On a 10+, ask 3. On a 7-9, ask 1:
• who handled this last before me?
• who made this?
• what strong emotions have been most recently nearby this?
• what words have been said most recently nearby this?
• what has been done most recently with this, or to this?
• what's wrong with this, and how might I fix it?
Treat a miss as though you've opened your brain to the world's psychic maelstrom and missed the roll.

bonefeel.title: bonefeel
bonefeel.description: at the beginning of the session, roll+weird. On a 10+, hold 1+1. On a 7-9, hold 1. At any time, either you or the MC can spend your hold to have you already be there, with the proper tools and knowledge, with or without any clear explanation why. If your hold was 1+1, take +1forward now. On a miss, the MC holds 1, and can spend it to have you already be there, but somehow pinned, caught or trapped.

oftenerRight.title: oftener right
oftenerRight.description: when a character comes to you for advice, tell them what you honestly think the best course is. If they do it, they take +1 to any rolls they make in the doing, and you mark an experience circle.

realityFrayingEdge.title: reality's fraying edge
realityFrayingEdge.description: some component of your workspace, or some arrangement of components, is uniquely receptive to the world's psychic maelstrom (+augury). Choose and name it, or else leave it for the MC to reveal during play.

spookyIntense.title: spooky intense
spookyIntense.description: when you do something under fire, roll+weird instead of roll+cool.

workspace.title: workspace
workspace.relicGoldenAge: a relic of the golden age past

skinner.special:
If you and another character have sex, choose one:
• You take +1 forward and so do they.
• You take +1 forward; they take -1.
• They must give you a gift worth at least 1-barter.
• You can hypnotize them as though you'd rolled a 10+, even if you haven't chosen to get the move.

graciousWeapons.title: gracious weapons
graciousWeapons.antiqueHandgun: antique handgun (2-harm close reload loud valuable)

luxeGear.title: luxe gear
luxeGear.antiqueCoins: antique coins (worn valuable) - Drilled with holes for jewelry.
luxeGear.eyeglasses: eyeglasses (worn valuable) - You may use these for +1sharp when your eyesight matters, but if you do, without them you get -1sharp when your eyesight matters.
luxeGear.skinHairKit: skin & hair kit (applied valuable) - Soaps, ochres, paints, creams, salves. Using it lets you take +1hot forward.
luxeGear.pet: a pet (valuable alive) - Your choice and yours to detail.

lost.title: lost
lost.description: when you whisper someone's name to the world's psychic maelstrom, roll+weird. On a hit, they come to you, with or without any clear explanation why. On a 10+, take +1forward against them. On a miss, the MC will ask you 3 questions; answer them truthfully.

artfulGracious.title: artful & gracious
artfulGracious.description:
when you perform your chosen art — any act of expression or culture — or when you put its product before an audience, roll+hot. On a 10+, spend 3. On a 7-9, spend 1. Spend 1 to name an NPC member of your audience and choose one:
• this person must meet me
• this person must have my services
• this person loves me
• this person must give me a gift
• this person admires my patron
On a miss, you gain no benefit, but suffer no harm or lost opportunity. You simply perform very well.

arrestingSkinner.title: an arresting skinner
arrestingSkinner.description: when you remove a piece of clothing, your own or someone else's, no one who can see you can do anything but watch. You command their absolute attention. If you choose, you can exempt individual people, by name.

hypnotic.title: hypnotic
hypnotic.description:
when you have time and solitude with someone, they become fixated upon you. Roll+hot. On a 10+, hold 3. On a 7-9, hold 2. ey can spend your hold, 1 for 1, by:
• giving you something you want
• acting as your eyes and ears
• fighting to protect you
• doing something you tell them to
For NPCs, while you have hold over them they can't act against you. For PCs, instead, any time you like you can spend your hold, 1 for 1:
• they distract themselves with the thought of you. ey're acting under fire.
• they inspire themselves with the thought of you. ey take +1 right now.
On a miss, they hold 2 over you, on the exact same terms.
